"Nazun": "Our first series of quizzes will be... \"YES or NO\" quizzes!"
"If you think a statement is true, stand on the Y platform. If you think it's false, stand on the N platform."
"Stand on the platform you think is correct answer! Think carefully, now!"
"That will be all for the \"YES or NO\" quiz. Let's move to the next quiz area!"
